ing: 1 1/8 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
des: "This is a bread machine recipe developed by my very talented mother, who grew up in Oregon, the Filbert (or Hazelnut) capital of the world! This bread has won raves from those who don't even like whole wheat bread."
ins: Follow the directions for your bread machine, but do not reserve the nuts for later: add them at the beginning for better flavor.
